item.title: coursera Andrew Ng 机器学习第一周笔记 线性回归
item.description: machine learning supervised learning, unsupervised learning, others(reinforcement learning, recommender system) supervised learning regressing，predict input into continuous result classification, predict input into distract result examples： given size, rooms, predict house price, like 1M, 100Grand, 1B house prize is expensive or cheap ? given picture with human, predict his age: 0.1，12.5，78.8 given a patient with tumor, predict it’s a malignant or benign unsupervised learning problems with little or no idea what our results should look like
